column5: Ice is now gone on the lower Niagara. River is super clear and the Bite is back on after a few slower days on the river last week. Upper River still has some ice floating around, That may find itâ€™s way below the Falls. The Weathers been really nice here in Niagara Falls, flowers are poppin up, Finally Winter is OVER!!!      Water temps are now 37 degrees. This is the beginning of some of the best steelhead fishing of the season! Fly Fishing on the Niagara will kick into high gear with these warmer temps. Walk and Wade adventures are at peak season.   Small roe bags, yarn flies and small minnow are producing fish for us.   See you on the River,  Cast Adventures
Awesome report and pics.  Looks like we went a week too early eh  Oh well, maybe we'll have to go for a day soon.  Joey
Spring is in the air. Da dada, Da dada...
Very Nice !!! Any idea where a good place is, this weekend to walk down and fish from shore, both drift and fly???  Thanks
You can hike the around glen, tons of different spots to explore.  good luck  Cast Adventures

Hi Joey  The Steelhead fishing will remain good until late May, early June. Last season our last steelhead charter was June 14th! The Niagara water stays colder then other rivers! We still have Fresh silvers showing up every day!  Go get'em
